SENT.plain: A case of central retinal artery occlusion in a patient with Marfan's syndrome secondary to possible thromboembolism from a prolapsed mitral valve is presented
Clinical investigations and treatment of this condition are discussed
The world literature on retinal occlusive events secondary to mitral valve prolapse is briefly summarised
To the best of our knowledge, this is the first case report in the literature of central retinal artery occlusion in a patient with Marfan's syndrome
